recipesJson.name: Spring Innocence - Week 2
recipesJson.author: JenniferJarvis
recipesJson.description:
Week 2 of The Year of Mixing - Light fluffy whipped marshmallow blended with a delicate blend of sweet fruits and a dash of a little bit of green.  The Zen Garden is optional here, recipe works well without it, but if you like a touch of spring green to your vape, you may enjoy it. I prefer FW Sweetener if I'm using sucralose, however you can replace it with whatever else you prefer. 

If you'd like to participate in the Year of Mixing find the Flavor-Pro group and join us for our weekly challenge - all mixers welcome - and there will be some prizes. You can find more information here http://flavor-pro.com/the-year-of-mixing/
